events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't updated.
The case has been classified under delivery delay due to the customer's report of a late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
Assigning the case to the logistics support team to investigate the delayed delivery issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can investigate the status of your delivery?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and it was supposed to be shipped to 45 Elm Street, Springfield.
We have contacted the courier service and it seems your package is delayed due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I understand delays happen, but I hope it arrives soon.
Your package was successfully delivered today. Please confirm once you have received it.
We are following up to ensure your package arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not received any further messages from you, your case has been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
